hadith.chapterTitle: The Prohibition of Backbiting and the Commandment of Guarding one's Tongue
hadith.body:
Abu Musa Al-Ash'ari (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: I asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ): "Who is the most excellent among the Muslims?" He said, "One from whose tongue and hands the other Muslims are secure."

[Al-Bukhari and Muslim].

hadith.chapterTitle: باب تحريم الغيبة والأمر بحفظ اللسان
hadith.body: - وعن أبي موسى رضي الله عنه قال‏:‏ قلت‏:‏ يا رسول الله أي المسلمين أفضل‏؟‏ قال‏:‏ ‏"‏من سلم المسلمون من لسانه ويده‏"‏‏.‏ ‏(‏‏(‏متفق عليه‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
